channel.title: How to make server using Hamachi
channel.description:
table of contents 1.hamachi 2.mopar 3.source 4.taharok's compiler 5.getting your server up 6.allowing other people to play. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 1.Hamachi
first were going to need hamachi most people dont like to use hamachi but i think it is easy efficent and a good way for people to connect to you. Why do you need hamachi well you need it so other people can connect to your server without it people wouldn't be able to connect. There is another way instead of hamachi, its a router but some people get confused so we will use hamachi.
to download it go to www.hamachi.cc
when you open the page there will be the download part off to the right side of the homepage. follow the instructions on downloading and place it in any folder. I recommend you make a new folder in say my documents and call it (YOURSERVERNAMEHERE).
hamachi is done for NOW!but you will need to use it later
2.Mopar
Well mopar is the way your going to run your server off of thanks to all the great people from there they created a webclient which is that exact same thing as downloading it but its just online. If you haven't already checked it out at www.moparisthebest.com go and check it out.
mopar is done for NOW!but we will also need it later.
3.Source
What's a source?well its what has all of the server files in it so that making,and tweaking your server is possible. I personally like to use pimpscape but if there is any other you will like to use go ahead. I DON'T RECCOMEND STARTING YOUR SERVER FROM SCRATCH IT WILL TAKE ALONG TIME AND YOU HAVE TO BE A SKILLED CODER!
so lets download pimpscape go to this link http://www.megaupload.com/?d=16KZIJK5 (credits for the link go to lost world)now that you have your source doanloaded we need to unzip it so either click it or right click it and click extract files here or to the folder which you want them to be make sure all files are kept together. you should see alot of files in there unless you know what to do dont touch any except for compile.bat and runserver.bat.
4.Mod Taharok's 'Perfect compiler
(!!!ALL CREDIT IS TO MOD TAHAROK!!!)
thanks to mod taharok we have a good compiler that works very good. the compiler is what compiles everything in your server files after you have made changes. To do this you need to go into the folder with all of your server files that you downloaded in step 3 and right click compile.bat erase everything in the text document and replace it with this.
[code] @echo off if exist "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\" set programfiles=C:\Program Files (x86) set pr=%programfiles%\Java\ :co1 set b=0 set t=7 goto co2 :co2 color %b%%t% :menu cls title YOURSERVERNAMEHERE compiler v1.9 echo Please choose an option below to do that function. echo Keep posted on the Moparscape Tutorials section for echo any updates that I post. echo. echo c - Compile your server. echo r - To Run your server. echo e - To exit out of the program. echo jar - It will create your server into an executable Jar archive. echo color - Change the Text and Backround colors of this compiler. echo reset - Resets your Compiler Logs. echo. echo. set /p c=Option: if %c%==c goto c if %c%==C goto c if %c%==r goto r if %c%==R goto r if %c%==jar goto jar if %c%==Jar goto jar if %c%==JAR goto jar if %c%==color goto color if %c%==Color goto color if %c%==COLOR goto color if %c%==reset goto reset if %c%==Reset goto reset if %c%==RESET goto reset if %c%==e goto e if %c%==E goto e if %c%==* goto er goto er :jar title Jar Creator cls echo What will be the name of the Jar file? echo. set /p name=Name: if exist *.class (del *.class) set pro=%pr%jdk1.5.0 set pro2=%pr%jdk1.6.0 set jav=bin\javac.exe set go=jar2 goto cj :jar2 %java% -cp . *java echo Manifest-Version: 1.0 >> manifest echo Created-By: 1.5.0_04 (Sun Microsystems Inc.) >> manifest echo Main-Class: server >> manifest set pro=%pr%jdk1.5.0 set pro2=%pr%jdk1.6.0 set jav=bin\jar.exe set go=jar3 goto cj :jar3 if not exist *.class (goto jre) %java% -cvfm %name%.jar manifest *.class del runserver.bat del manifest del *.class goto jl :jar4 set pro=%pr%jre1.5.0 set pro2=%pr%jre1.6.0 set jav=bin\java.exe set go=jar5 goto cj :jar5 echo @echo off >> runserver.bat echo title %name% >> runserver.bat echo %java% -cp .;%name%.jar server >> runserver.bat echo pause >> runserver.bat cls echo %name% Jar file successfully made. The runserver.bat will echo now load the Jar file. If you have any errors while runnning echo the Jar file, please post about it in Mod Taharok's 'Perfect echo Compiler' topic on MoparScape. pause goto menu set :color cls echo Would you like to change the backround color, change echo the text color, or reset it to default? echo. echo back - Change the backround color. echo text - Change the text color. echo def - Change all colors back to default. echo. echo. set /p color=Option: if %color%==back goto back if %color%==BACK goto back if %color%==text goto text if %color%==TEXT goto text if %color%==def goto co1 if %color%==DEF goto co1 if %color%==* goto er goto er :back cls echo Please select a color to change the backround to: echo. echo black echo white echo red echo yellow echo green echo blue echo purple echo. echo. set /p back=Color: if %back%== black (set b=0) if %back%== white (set b=7) if %back%== red (set b=4) if %back%== yellow (set b=6) if %back%== green (set b=2) if %back%== blue (set b=1) if %back%== purple (set b=5) goto co2 :text cls echo Please select a color to change the text to: echo. echo black echo white echo red echo yellow echo green echo blue echo purple echo. echo. set /p back=Color: if %back%== black (set t=0) if %back%== white (set t=7) if %back%== red (set t=4) if %back%== yellow (set t=6) if %back%== green (set t=2) if %back%== blue (set t=1) if %back%== purple (set t=5) goto co2 :c cls title Compiler YOURSERVERNAMEHERE set pro=%pr%jdk1.5.0 set pro2=%pr%jdk1.6.0 set jav=bin\javac.exe set go=c2 goto cj :c2 if exist src (goto cl) else (goto c3) :c3 if exist *.java (goto cl2) else (goto ce) :c4 %java% -cp . *.java echo Files Compiled Successfully! pause cls goto menu :c5 %java% -cp . .\src\*.java echo Files Compiled Successfully! pause move .\src\*.class .\classes\ cls goto menu :ce cls echo You must have Java files for this Compiler to Compile. pause cls goto menu :r cls title Runserver set pro=%pr%jre1.5.0 set pro2=%pr%jre1.6.0 set jav=bin\java.exe set go=r2 goto cj :r2 set rjava=%java% -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server cls goto r3 :r3 if exist .\classes\server.class (goto sl2) else (goto r4) :r4 if exist .\server.class (goto sl) else (goto se) :r5 %rjava% pause cls goto menu :r6 set rjava= set rjava=%java% -cp .;./classes; Server %rjava% pause cls goto menu :se cls title Error echo You do not have a Server.class. Make sure that you have used the echo compiler with your server BEFORE you try runing it. pause cls goto menu :er cls title Error echo Invalid command. Please make sure the commands you type echo in are correct. pause cls goto menu :e cls exit :cj if exist "%pro2%_01\%jav%" (goto sj) if exist "%pro2%\%jav%" (goto sj2) if exist "%pro%_10\%jav%" (goto sj3) if exist "%pro%_09\%jav%" (goto sj4) if exist "%pro%_08\%jav%" (goto sj5) if exist "%pro%_07\%jav%" (goto sj6) if exist "%pro%_06\%jav%" (goto sj7) if exist "%pro%_05\%jav%" (goto sj8) if exist "%pro%_04\%jav%" (goto sj9) if exist "%pro%_03\%jav%" (goto sj10) if exist "%pro%_02\%jav%" (goto sj11) if exist "%pro%_01\%jav%" (goto sj12) if exist "%pro%\%jav%" (goto sj13) else (goto je) :sj set java="%pro2%_01\%jav%" goto %go% :sj2 set java="%pro2%\%jav%" goto %go% :sj3 set java="%pro%_10\%jav%" goto %go% :sj4 set java="%pro%_09\%jav%" goto %go% :sj5 set java="%pro%_08\%jav%" goto %go% :sj6 set java="%pro%_07\%jav%" goto %go% :sj7 set java="%pro%_06\%jav%" goto %go% :sj8 set java="%pro%_05\%jav%" goto %go% :sj9 set java="%pro%_04\%jav%" goto %go% :sj10 set java="%pro%_03\%jav%" goto %go% :sj11 set java="%pro%_02\%jav%" goto %go% :sj12 set java="%pro%_01\%jav%" goto %go% :sj13 set java="%pro%\%jav%" goto %go% :je cls title Error echo You do not have JDK 5.0 or JDK 6.0 or any JDK 5.0 and 6.0 updates. echo Go to Mod Taharok's tutorial on the Moparscape Tuturoials section echo for step-by-step instructions to download the newest JDK Update. pause cls goto menu :sl cls echo Ran Server at %time% and on %date%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Server was run using %java%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Thank you for using Mod Taharok's 'Perfect' Compiler! >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt" goto r5 :sl2 cls echo Ran Server at %time% and on %date%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Server was run using %java%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Thank you for using Mod Taharok's 'Perfect' Compiler! >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt" goto r6 :cl cls echo Compiled Java files at %time% and on %date%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Java files were compiled using %java%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Thank you for using Mod Taharok's 'Perfect' Compiler! >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt" goto c5 :cl2 cls echo Compiled Java files at %time% and on %date%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Java files were compiled using %java%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Thank you for using Mod Taharok's 'Perfect' Compiler! >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt" goto c4 :jl cls echo %name% Jar file created at %time% and on %date%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Jar file was created using %java%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Thank you for using Mod Taharok's 'Perfect' Compiler! >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt" goto jar4 :reset cls echo Resetting the Compiler's Logs... pause del "Compile Logs.txt" goto menu [/code]
that should make it so that your compiler is uptodate and works good. now that the compiler part is done getting your server started.
5.Getting Your Server Started.
Now this is were hamachi mopar and your source comes in
to start open hamachi and it should be a little box on your screen. in the bottom right corner of the hamachi program you should see something that looks like a gear and something that looks like a triangle.CLICK THE TRIANGLE!!dont click the other thing. once you clicked on it you should see a couple of options and you need to click create a new network. it asks for servername:YOURSERVERNAMEHERE and server pass:CREATEASERVERPASS this is going to be what other people type in when they open up there hamachi so they can connect to your server. Now mopar comes in either go to www.moparisthebest.com or open up the downloaded moparscape 3.2 with arayn from moparisthebest.com or moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php now just leave that running for now.go into the folder that has all your files you downloaded from step 3 and click- runserver.bat a black box should appear on your screen and should say starting pimpscape server on 0.0.0.0 5555-the 0.0.0.0 isent really nonthing but the 5555 means alot that is the port that yourself or other players trying to connect to your server will have to type in.open up the moparscape downloaded file or the moparisthebest.com and you should see something similar to runescape with the existing user etc. go to the top left corner and click file there should be a couple of options click new server.a box should appear. now open up the hamachi window and you should see at the top an ip address that is the ip that yourself and other people will use to connect to your server.type in the ip from hamachi into the box that appeared when you clicked new server.now click new port and all you have to do is put in 5555.this part is done.click on enter and it should come up where you have username-password-and serverip leave the server ip if it dosent have the same ip from your hamachi program then you yped in the wrong one then you can fix it by repeating the new server step above.type in any username and password and click log in,if it dosent open something similar to runescape and it says error connecting to server then you either put the ip or the port wrong so fix them.now you should be done!you can now play by yourself.
6.allowing other people to play.
want other people to play on your server?well follow these steps and they will be able to.
if you dont want to create a forum or a website that will make your server that much better then just read on. i like to have a forum for a server it makes it look better but you can also have just a website. if you want a forum i advise you to pick an easy online forum creator i like to use myfastforum.org so we will use that one for now.-go to www.myfastforum.org and click create forum follow the steps and create your forum if you would like to see an example of a private server forum visit this link. drewscape.smfforfree3.com for a website just use an easy website builder by going to www.piczo.com and signing up and making one.
i told you that becuase that is how your going to advertise your server or you can post at the moparscape forums and advertise there. Ok back on topic want other people to connect to your server its easy. All you have to do is make sure they have hamachi and give them the server name and pass that you created in step 1. now give them your ip on the top of your hamachi program and tell them to do the same you did to connect to your server.tell them to use the port 5555.if there is problems with people trying to connect to your server pm me and i will help.

item.title: How to make server using Hamachi
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

im srry but i cant get in ive tryed it but it says connecting to MYSERVNAME connect to port 5555.
and after tht error connect heheh umm lol

Read full topic
item.source: How to make server using Hamachi

i cant use port forward becuz my dad dont like it.
and he has worked with no-ip so i cant use it becuz he got a virus.
now i can use HAMACHI THANKS TO YOU rep when i get 15 pts[/quote]

You must be 13 years old to be on these forums.

Read full topic

item.source: How to make server using Hamachi

item.title: How to make server using Hamachi
item.dc:creator: @Drew_Scape Drew_Scape
item.description:
@Drew_Scape wrote:

    table of contents
    1.hamachi
    2.mopar
    3.source
    4.taharok's compiler
    5.getting your server up
    6.allowing other people to play.

1.Hamachi

first were going to need hamachi most people dont like to use hamachi but i think it is easy
efficent and a good way for people to connect to you. Why do you need hamachi well you need
it so other people can connect to your server without it people wouldn’t be able to connect.
There is another way instead of hamachi, its a router but some people get confused so we will use hamachi.

to download it go to www.hamachi.cc

when you open the page there will be the download part off to the right side of the homepage.
follow the instructions on downloading and place it in any folder. I recommend you make a
new folder in say my documents and call it (YOURSERVERNAMEHERE).

hamachi is done for NOW!but you will need to use it later

2.Mopar

Well mopar is the way your going to run your server off of thanks to all the great people from there
they created a webclient which is that exact same thing as downloading it but its just online. If you
haven’t already checked it out at www.moparisthebest.com go and check it out.

mopar is done for NOW!but we will also need it later.

3.Source

What’s a source?well its what has all of the server files in it so that making,and tweaking your
server is possible. I personally like to use pimpscape but if there is any other you will like
to use go ahead. I DON’T RECCOMEND STARTING YOUR SERVER FROM SCRATCH IT WILL TAKE ALONG TIME
AND YOU HAVE TO BE A SKILLED CODER!

so lets download pimpscape go to this link http://www.megaupload.com/?d=16KZIJK5
(credits for the link go to lost world)now that you have your source doanloaded
we need to unzip it so either click it or right click it and click extract files here
or to the folder which you want them to be make sure all files are kept together.
you should see alot of files in there unless you know what to do dont touch any except for
compile.bat and runserver.bat.

4.Mod Taharok’s 'Perfect compiler

(!!!ALL CREDIT IS TO MOD TAHAROK!!!)

thanks to mod taharok we have a good compiler that works very good. the compiler is what
compiles everything in your server files after you have made changes. To do this you need to
go into the folder with all of your server files that you downloaded in step 3 and right click compile.bat
erase everything in the text document and replace it with this.

@echo off
if exist "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\" set programfiles=C:\Program Files (x86)
set pr=%programfiles%\Java\
:co1
set b=0
set t=7
goto co2
:co2
color %b%%t%
:menu
cls
title YOURSERVERNAMEHERE compiler v1.9
echo Please choose an option below to do that function.
echo Keep posted on the Moparscape Tutorials section for
echo any updates that I post.
echo.
echo c - Compile your server.
echo r - To Run your server.
echo e - To exit out of the program.
echo jar - It will create your server into an executable Jar archive.
echo color - Change the Text and Backround colors of this compiler.
echo reset - Resets your Compiler Logs.
echo.
echo.
set /p c=Option: 
if %c%==c goto c
if %c%==C goto c
if %c%==r goto r
if %c%==R goto r
if %c%==jar goto jar
if %c%==Jar goto jar
if %c%==JAR goto jar
if %c%==color goto color
if %c%==Color goto color
if %c%==COLOR goto color
if %c%==reset goto reset
if %c%==Reset goto reset
if %c%==RESET goto reset
if %c%==e goto e
if %c%==E goto e
if %c%==* goto er
goto er
:jar
title Jar Creator
cls
echo What will be the name of the Jar file?
echo.
set /p name=Name: 
if exist *.class (del *.class)
set pro=%pr%jdk1.5.0
set pro2=%pr%jdk1.6.0
set jav=bin\javac.exe
set go=jar2
goto cj
:jar2
%java% -cp . *java
echo Manifest-Version: 1.0 >> manifest
echo Created-By: 1.5.0_04 (Sun Microsystems Inc.) >> manifest
echo Main-Class: server >> manifest
set pro=%pr%jdk1.5.0
set pro2=%pr%jdk1.6.0
set jav=bin\jar.exe
set go=jar3
goto cj
:jar3
if not exist *.class (goto jre)
%java% -cvfm %name%.jar manifest *.class
del runserver.bat
del manifest
del *.class
goto jl
:jar4
set pro=%pr%jre1.5.0
set pro2=%pr%jre1.6.0
set jav=bin\java.exe
set go=jar5
goto cj
:jar5
echo @echo off  >> runserver.bat
echo title %name% >> runserver.bat
echo %java% -cp .;%name%.jar server >> runserver.bat
echo pause >> runserver.bat
cls
echo %name% Jar file successfully made. The runserver.bat will
echo now load the Jar file. If you have any errors while runnning
echo the Jar file, please post about it in Mod Taharok's 'Perfect
echo Compiler' topic on MoparScape.
pause
goto menu
set 
:color
cls
echo Would you like to change the backround color, change
echo the text color, or reset it to default?
echo.
echo back - Change the backround color.
echo text - Change the text color.
echo def - Change all colors back to default.
echo.
echo.
set /p color=Option: 
if %color%==back goto back
if %color%==BACK goto back
if %color%==text goto text
if %color%==TEXT goto text
if %color%==def goto co1
if %color%==DEF goto co1
if %color%==* goto er
goto er
:back
cls
echo Please select a color to change the backround to:
echo.
echo black
echo white
echo red
echo yellow
echo green
echo blue
echo purple
echo.
echo.
set /p back=Color: 
if %back%== black (set b=0)
if %back%== white (set b=7)
if %back%== red (set b=4)
if %back%== yellow (set b=6)
if %back%== green (set b=2)
if %back%== blue (set b=1)
if %back%== purple (set b=5)
goto co2
:text
cls
echo Please select a color to change the text to:
echo.
echo black
echo white
echo red
echo yellow
echo green
echo blue
echo purple
echo.
echo.
set /p back=Color: 
if %back%== black (set t=0)
if %back%== white (set t=7)
if %back%== red (set t=4)
if %back%== yellow (set t=6)
if %back%== green (set t=2)
if %back%== blue (set t=1)
if %back%== purple (set t=5)
goto co2
:c
cls
title Compiler YOURSERVERNAMEHERE
set pro=%pr%jdk1.5.0
set pro2=%pr%jdk1.6.0
set jav=bin\javac.exe
set go=c2
goto cj
:c2
if exist src (goto cl) else (goto c3)
:c3
if exist *.java (goto cl2) else (goto ce)
:c4
%java% -cp . *.java
echo Files Compiled Successfully!
pause
cls
goto menu
:c5
%java% -cp . .\src\*.java
echo Files Compiled Successfully!
pause
move .\src\*.class .\classes\
cls
goto menu
:ce
cls
echo You must have Java files for this Compiler to Compile.
pause
cls
goto menu
:r
cls
title Runserver
set pro=%pr%jre1.5.0
set pro2=%pr%jre1.6.0
set jav=bin\java.exe
set go=r2
goto cj
:r2
set rjava=%java% -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
cls
goto r3
:r3
if exist .\classes\server.class (goto sl2) else (goto r4)
:r4
if exist .\server.class (goto sl) else (goto se)
:r5
%rjava%
pause
cls
goto menu
:r6
set rjava=
set rjava=%java% -cp .;./classes; Server
%rjava%
pause
cls
goto menu
:se
cls
title Error
echo You do not have a Server.class. Make sure that you have used the
echo compiler with your server BEFORE you try runing it.
pause
cls
goto menu
:er
cls
title Error
echo Invalid command. Please make sure the commands you type
echo in are correct.
pause
cls
goto menu
:e
cls
exit
:cj
if exist "%pro2%_01\%jav%" (goto sj)
if exist "%pro2%\%jav%" (goto sj2)
if exist "%pro%_10\%jav%" (goto sj3)
if exist "%pro%_09\%jav%" (goto sj4)
if exist "%pro%_08\%jav%" (goto sj5)
if exist "%pro%_07\%jav%" (goto sj6)
if exist "%pro%_06\%jav%" (goto sj7)
if exist "%pro%_05\%jav%" (goto sj8)
if exist "%pro%_04\%jav%" (goto sj9)
if exist "%pro%_03\%jav%" (goto sj10)
if exist "%pro%_02\%jav%" (goto sj11)
if exist "%pro%_01\%jav%" (goto sj12)
if exist "%pro%\%jav%" (goto sj13) else (goto je)
:sj
set java="%pro2%_01\%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj2
set java="%pro2%\%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj3
set java="%pro%_10\%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj4
set java="%pro%_09\%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj5
set java="%pro%_08\%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj6
set java="%pro%_07\%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj7
set java="%pro%_06\%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj8
set java="%pro%_05\%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj9
set java="%pro%_04\%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj10
set java="%pro%_03\%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj11
set java="%pro%_02\%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj12
set java="%pro%_01\%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj13
set java="%pro%\%jav%"
goto %go%
:je
cls
title Error
echo You do not have JDK 5.0 or JDK 6.0 or any JDK 5.0 and 6.0 updates.
echo Go to Mod Taharok's tutorial on the Moparscape Tuturoials section
echo for step-by-step instructions to download the newest JDK Update.
pause
cls
goto menu
:sl
cls
echo Ran Server at %time% and on %date%. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo Server was run using %java%. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo Thank you for using Mod Taharok's 'Perfect' Compiler! >> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
goto r5
:sl2
cls
echo Ran Server at %time% and on %date%. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo Server was run using %java%. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo Thank you for using Mod Taharok's 'Perfect' Compiler! >> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
goto r6
:cl
cls
echo Compiled Java files at %time% and on %date%. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo Java files were compiled using %java%. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo Thank you for using Mod Taharok's 'Perfect' Compiler! >> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
goto c5
:cl2
cls
echo Compiled Java files at %time% and on %date%. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo Java files were compiled using %java%. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo Thank you for using Mod Taharok's 'Perfect' Compiler! >> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
goto c4
:jl
cls
echo %name% Jar file created at %time% and on %date%. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo Jar file was created using %java%. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo Thank you for using Mod Taharok's 'Perfect' Compiler! >> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
goto jar4
:reset
cls
echo Resetting the Compiler's Logs...
pause
del "Compile Logs.txt"
goto menu

that should make it so that your compiler is uptodate and works good.
now that the compiler part is done getting your server started.

5.Getting Your Server Started.

Now this is were hamachi mopar and your source comes in

to start open hamachi and it should be a little box on your screen.
in the bottom right corner of the hamachi program you should see something that looks
like a gear and something that looks like a triangle.CLICK THE TRIANGLE!!dont click the other thing.
once you clicked on it you should see a couple of options and you need to click create a new network.
it asks for servername:YOURSERVERNAMEHERE and server pass:CREATEASERVERPASS this is going to be what other people
type in when they open up there hamachi so they can connect to your server.
Now mopar comes in either go to www.moparisthebest.com or open up the downloaded moparscape 3.2 with arayn from
moparisthebest.com or moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php now just leave that running for now.go into the folder that
has all your files you downloaded from step 3 and click- runserver.bat a black box should appear on your screen
and should say starting pimpscape server on 0.0.0.0 5555-the 0.0.0.0 isent really nonthing but the 5555 means alot
that is the port that yourself or other players trying to connect to your server will have to type in.open up the moparscape
downloaded file or the moparisthebest.com and you should see something similar to runescape with the existing user etc.
go to the top left corner and click file there should be a couple of options click new server.a box should appear.
now open up the hamachi window and you should see at the top an ip address that is the ip that yourself and other
people will use to connect to your server.type in the ip from hamachi into the box that appeared when you clicked
new server.now click new port and all you have to do is put in 5555.this part is done.click on enter and it should come up
where you have username-password-and serverip leave the server ip if it dosent have the same ip from your hamachi program then
you yped in the wrong one then you can fix it by repeating the new server step above.type in any username and password and click
log in,if it dosent open something similar to runescape and it says error connecting to server then you either put
the ip or the port wrong so fix them.now you should be done!you can now play by yourself.

6.allowing other people to play.

want other people to play on your server?well follow these steps and they will be able to.

if you dont want to create a forum or a website that will make your server that much better then just read on.
i like to have a forum for a server it makes it look better but you can also have just a website.
if you want a forum i advise you to pick an easy online forum creator i like to use myfastforum.org
so we will use that one for now.-go to www.myfastforum.org and click create forum follow the steps and
create your forum if you would like to see an example of a private server forum visit this link.
drewscape.smfforfree3.com for a website just use an easy website builder by going to
www.piczo.com and signing up and making one.

i told you that becuase that is how your going to advertise your server or you can post at the moparscape
forums and advertise there. Ok back on topic want other people to connect to your server its easy.
All you have to do is make sure they have hamachi and give them the server name and pass that you
created in step 1. now give them your ip on the top of your hamachi program and tell them to do the same you
did to connect to your server.tell them to use the port 5555.if there is problems with people trying to
connect to your server pm me and i will help.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make server using Hamachi
